subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: After defeating Vera Zvonareva to win her third United States Open championship, Kim Clijsters celebrated on the Arthur Ashe Stadium court with her 2 ½-year-old daughter.
snippet: After defeating Vera Zvonareva to win her third United States Open championship, Kim Clijsters celebrated on the Arthur Ashe Stadium court with her 2 ½-year-old daughter.
